segments.text: Good morning . SRC international . How may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning . I'd like to speak to Peter . Chen Please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . Who should I say is calling ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is Tim . Hunter from Hunter industries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And what is it regarding please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have an appointment for this afternoon . Mr . Chen will know why I'm calling .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , Please hold the line Mr . Hunter .
segments.speaker: S1
